website_summaries.verdict: A solid daily moisturizer that helps prevent early signs of aging, for those who are just dabbling into anti-aging skincare routines.
pros: Customers love its lightweight texture and long-lasting hydration
cons: May not be the best choice for oily skin types

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer. I first got it years ago from Sephora as a small free gift. It is very light and has the most pleasant and soothing smell. Smells like light cucumber fresh out of the spa! It does not irritate me at all around the eye area, like other moisturizers can. Keeps my skin feeling soft and healthy. I would totally recommend trying this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D.

customer_reviews.title: I have consistently dry skin and this is the best I've found for keeping it hydrated without looking like ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the jam. I have consistently dry skin and this is the best I've found for keeping it hydrated without looking like I've dipped my face in a vat of vasoline.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Price is a rip off
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, works well with my daughter’s skin however the price is a rip off, I’ve previously bought the same product and same multiple times from Sephora for USD40. My bad I thought this was a bigger bottle so I ordered here. Never again If you can make it to a Sephora but it there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already open when received
customer_reviews.text: I can’t review the actual face cream. It arrived with the box open. Then there was some sort of seal on the bottle that was also broken. I won’t use a product on my face that has obviously been opened already.
customer_reviews.author: NJMom

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this moisturizer. keeps skin firm and fresh. I have been using this moisturizer for three years and I don't plan to change.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh, light. I 'm still old unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh, light. I 'm still old unfortunately. Think it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great cream
customer_reviews.text: Great face cream. Great cucumber smell and great texture. Have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: My skin loves this
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quality product that lasts quite awhile. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Aariela

customer_reviews.title: Best Facial Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a morning moisturizer under my foundation and less is more, so this jar will last six months.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this moisturizer!!! Light weight but really leaves the skin feeling well moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Centeno

customer_reviews.title: My skin glows now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial moisturizer. My aesthetician recommended this and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Ann Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... is a bit demanding and this product is not bad. I don't think it's great either
customer_reviews.text: My skin is a bit demanding and this product is not bad. I don't think it's great either. I can't get passed the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mar De Li Word

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite product. Light and does not cause breakouts on ...
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite product. Light and does not cause breakouts on my sensitive skin. perfect to wear under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is light and not greasy. It covers quickly and then dries quickly. I don't know if it is going to preserve my face but it works for my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: All Fresh products rocket your skin into the next dimension of clean & healthy. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Demcak

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cream I have ever bought. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Sumaya Silva

customer_reviews.title: Cucumbery
customer_reviews.text: Cool and light with just the right amount of moisturizer for my high humidity climate
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K J Van Pelt

customer_reviews.title: Super Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she swears by it. Nice fragrance. Very effective. Her skin really looks great.
customer_reviews.author: burdli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and will continue to purchase and use for a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I live this face cream. It has really helped my skin look fresh and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Kontogeorgis

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face cream. I don't believe I would be without it in my beauty essentials. Great product, a little pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Things is very good, I very like this one, use the feeling is very good, face is very very moist
customer_reviews.author: huangat6

customer_reviews.title: Like the product, not crazy over the smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the face cream; it leaves my skin moist, dewey yet not sticky or oily; things that I look for in a facial moisturizer. I'm not crazy off the scent though - it smell's 'grassy' 'like hay' to me. I will probably try a different product because to me a pleasing scent is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Deb & Jer R.

customer_reviews.title: Rich yet easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I always hesitate to purchase a moisture cream unless I can actually feel the weight of it. This product is amazing in texture. It does not feel heavy and greasy on your face. Very rich yet extremely easy to wear. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C. Beno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love this face cream, it makes your skin feel so fresh. Nice light scent too.
customer_reviews.author: B Barton

customer_reviews.title: ... this is the only face cream/lotion that i have enjoyed. it isnt oily & it has a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: so far this is the only face cream/lotion that i have enjoyed. it isnt oily & it has a nice mild fragrance that doesnt linger. after using any kind of cleanser or wash , my face will get very dry , but this cream resolves that very quickly. it keeps my skin soft even during the harsh windy winter season. it is pricey for such a small jar, but its worth it for the results.
customer_reviews.author: Donut

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moisturizer, my face sems to have an instant glow when I use it. It is a little heavy for humid summer days, so I am just using at night currently. Perfect for everyday use in fall and winter, doesnt take alot either so will last a long time. I read a few reviews that stated the smell was bad, and it is a unique smell; however I think it is "fresh" :) and I have a stronger sensitivity to smells.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: Best Cream Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. It is so light but provides tons of moisture. I don't have time to always go to the mall, so ordering through this company with free shipping is awesome. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The very high cost of a face cream, for my age, will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: The very high cost of a face cream, for my age, will continue to buy。1 more word requiredmore word required
customer_reviews.author: merryany

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS PRODUCT FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER FROM AMAZON. I have been using this product for years. I’ve ordered from amazon a few times last year at a $48 price. Now they have doubled the price. Do not order from Amazon! Order from Sephora. It is a great product and the price should be $48 not almost $100!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: No more dry face!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only facial moisturizer that I've found to work for me. It's my Holy Grail! My face feels moisturized for days!! Literally if I skip a day of showering I don't need to reapply in the AM most days. Any other cream I've used, I need to use it in the AM and at night before bed every day. This stuff is amazing and last me a long while per bottle
customer_reviews.author: LJV

customer_reviews.title: Its fine
customer_reviews.text: The product smells like cucumbers which is fun. It feels absolutely wonderful going on. But it doesn't seem to do anything other than moisturize. My $8 ELF moisturizer does that just as well. Nice product, but too expensive for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: NegansLucille

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It works so good and makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on accident and planned on returning it. I have very dry and rough skin so I decided on trying it. I love it! It works so good and makes my skin feel moisturized and smoother. But, the product smells like cucumbers. That's not my most favorite smell, but if you love that smell then you will absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fine facial lotion
customer_reviews.text: Cooling and moisturizing. It gives your face a fresh, hydrated feel when first applied, contributing elasticity and softness throughout the day. It is expensive...I wish it weren't...but thus far, it seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: family buyer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy natural fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love the consistency of this cream, however, I do think the rose version goes on much smoother....but...I cannot stand the smell of...rose...so I will stick with the lotus cream.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Braccio

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite moisturizer! I first bought it at Sephora but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer! I first bought it at Sephora but Amazon is much more convenient. I have dry, acne prone skin and this is so light that is does not cause breakouts. I love the fresh smell, not overpowering at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Great Hydrating Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the fruity smell and my soft skin. Excellent product. I've bought this item once before.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: Love all Fresh products but this cream has really been nice
customer_reviews.author: deMarco DeCiccio

customer_reviews.title: I hate the price
customer_reviews.text: I hate the price, but I love this face cream. I've been using it for over 2 years and it's the only one I buy. It makes my face feel so good. I have sensitive skin and it never irritates it. I just really think it could be about $10 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly303

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on the face
customer_reviews.text: I love Fresh products. This moisturizer is very heavy on the face, I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: pauline B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It takes just a small amount but keeps my face feeling fresh and moisturized all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bo

customer_reviews.title: I love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. My makeup goes on so nicely after I use it - I've tried others and they just aren't the same. I'm sticking with Fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Charbonnier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my skin soft with that nice dewey glow. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Varian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives my skin an amazing shine, and it feels great, light and smooth. It smells amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! I have very dry
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I have very dry, irritated skin and this product works wonders for that. My only problem is that it's quite expensive for the amount you get. I am already 3/4 of the way down and have only had it a week. Granted I use it twice a day, still wish it was double the size for the price. But again, amazing product!! I will still continue to purchase it as my skin has never looked or felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Czapla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My skin looks radiant. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: daiva

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell the smoothness and its not greasy or heavy on the skin - absorbs quickly -I have had several compliments on my skin since using this product
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.

customer_reviews.title: Great face cream
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive and the cream I had been using for years I can't get any longer. So I took a chance with this one and it is great!It moisturizers and makes my skin feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this promoted in a magazine and purchased it. It goes on so nice, feels wonderful and really helps keep my face moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Pam OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and Not Greasy
customer_reviews.text: This product has a soothing feeling, and feels good on your face. No greasy feeling like with some moisturizers. Just a slight very pleasant fragrance. I will buy it again. I have sensitive skin, and I have had not reactions to this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: cbear

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: it is not very good ,i think it is just normal .and the taste is not very good.my skin didn't change after use it.it had no good
customer_reviews.author: LIANG LINGXIA

product_meta.title: Fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Face Cream With Super 7 Complex (50ml)
product_meta.description: An anti-aging facial moisturizer Formulated with a proprietary Super 7 Complex to provide 24 hours of moisture Reduces and prevents visible signs of aging Enriched with maca root extract to boost radiance of skin Unveils a smoother, clearer, more elastic and healthier looking complexion
feature_bullets: An anti-aging facial moisturizer Formulated with a proprietary Super 7 Complex to provide 24 hours of moisture Reduces
Prevents visible signs of aging Enriched with maca root extract to boost radiance of skin Unveils a smoother, clearer, more elastic
